result.execSummary:
The defendant Alex N. Hitz was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor [Modifiers: Repeater], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).
  • Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal) [Modifiers: Repeater], an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.44(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Court calls 15CF224, 16CM119, 16CM189, 16CM26617CF31, 18CF152, 18CF191@ 12:02 pm  Court call on own motion, Court ran out of time and going to reschedule.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 3, 2018 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant Alex N. Hitz in court  via video, with attorney Alec Nocco. Defendant in custody.   Elizabeth R. Gebert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   18CF191, 18CF152, 17CF31,16CM266, 16CM189, 15CF224 16CM119.  18CF152, 18CF191 complaint received.  Time limits waived for preliminary hearing.   Timely preliminary hearing reviewed  with def.  Def agrees to waive time limit.  Court will accept waiver of time limits.  Status conference scheduled for August 27, 2018 at 10:00 am.

Court calls 15CF224, 16CM119, 16CM189, 16CM266, 17CF31,18CF152 & 18CF191 @ 9:20 a.m. Defendant Alex N. Hitz in court, in custody and via video.  Elizabeth R. Gebert appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 18CF152 & 18CF191 Set for initial appearance all other cases set for Status.  18CF152 & 18CF191 Def. has copy of complaint, advised of charges and penalties.  Def. given atty rights and given 3 options.  Defendant notifies court that Atty Nocco is representing him on all cases.  State gives bond argument.  Bond remains.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 23, 2018 at 01:30 pm.

Gebert appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty Dodge & Def. must appear for Status in person.  Status conference scheduled for May 7, 2018 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Alex N. Hitz not in court.  Elizabeth R. Gebert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Cases called 15CF224, 16CM119, 16CM189, 16CM266 & 17CF31,   Case called at 11:36 am.   Statement by Atty Gebert.   State is requesting warrant $3000.00 or body, state wide.   Court will authorize warrant on 15CF224 as requested.  Def appears at 11:42 am    Court will contact Atty Dodge    Atty Dodge appears by phone.  Atty Dodge explains.  Def gives his phone numbers to Atty Dodge.  Address given on record.  E-mail address given to attorney.  Statement by Atty Gebert.   Court instructs def he must appear for status conf  Status conference scheduled for February 26, 2018 at 03:30 pm.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Alex N. Hitz in court with attorney Gary Stephen Dodge.  Elizabeth R. Constable appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court calls 16CM119, 16CM189, 16CM266 @ 1:34 p.m. Atty Dodge appears specially on 16CM266, enters not guilty pleas. Court receives pleas. State heard on bond. Asks for signature bond with condition. Court sets $1,000 signature bond w/condition. 16CM119 and 16CM189 set for status conf. Court also calls 15CF224. Motion to revoke deferred entry of judgment agreement. Court reviews. Recess 1:40 Resume 1:41. 15CF224 Def will not contest revoking DEJ. Court finds agreement was not fulfilled. All cases set for status conference.  Status conference scheduled for February 13, 2017 at 03:30 pm.
Status conference on September 19, 2016 at 03:30 pm.
